snippet: For decades, Mormonism was largely ignored by scholars, but a growing cadre of academics find that studying the church can offer new views of religion and the modern world.
abstract: Mormonism, once an American religion largely ignored by scholars, has been promoted by a growing cadre of academics who find that studying the church can offer new views of religion and the modern world.
